positive_examples: This is an example of fist.
We observed fist in this context.
A typical case of fist would involve these features.
The concept of fist applies here.
A hand gesture where fingers are curled tightly into the palm to form a closed hand, often expressing determination or solidarity.
negative_examples: This is an example of waving, not fist.
This represents hand gesture in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Waving, or other types of HandGesture

definition: A hand gesture with fingers curled tightly against the palm.
